channel.title: Comments on: Programatically finding the ColdFusion installation and mail spool directories
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Adrian Lynch
item.dc:creator: Adrian Lynch
item.description: I wonder what happens if you try and set it to something else?
item.content:encoded: I wonder what happens if you try and set it to something else?

item.title: By: Ash
item.dc:creator: Ash
item.description: Excellent stuff, thanks Ryan... I had been messing around trying to find the structure by debugging CFAdmin, but this sorted my problem out straight away.
item.content:encoded: Excellent stuff, thanks Ryan… I had been messing around trying to find the structure by debugging CFAdmin, but this sorted my problem out straight away.

item.title: By: mark Kruger
item.dc:creator: mark Kruger
item.description: Ryan, Nice write-up. Someday someone needs to publish a list of links for all the little "service factory" tips that are out there.
item.content:encoded: Ryan, Nice write-up. Someday someone needs to publish a list of links for all the little “service factory” tips that are out there.
